price: Is it you who produced its trees[8], or is it We Who produced it?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ
footnotes: [8] Referring to Arabian trees, markh and ‘afār, which produce fire when their green branches are rubbed against each other.
